If your child is showing symptoms of illness, please keep them home until they are fever-free for 24 hours and symptom-free. Fever free means they have not had a fever (temperature over 100.5) for 24 hours and have not had any Tylenol/Motrin to reduce their fever in that time period. The flu can be spread for up to 7 days after symptoms start. Most providers are writing students off for at least 5 days & it is encouraged that you take the full time to recover. This is beneficial and encouraged to make sure students don‚Äôt come back too soon and spread‚Ä¶ More
